GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

POST /register.description: creates a new instance of a user with the posted data in the database
POST /register.exampleResponse: does not return anything instead sends response with a 201 CREATED status code

POST /login.description: uses passport-local strategy to safely authenticate the user and stores a cookie in the browser

GET /logout.description: logs out the authenticated user and removes him or her from the session
